name: PercutaneousCoronaryInterventionSNOMEDCT
title: Percutaneous Coronary Intervention SNOMEDCT
description: This value set does not contain codes indicating an emergent PCI procedure.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of SNOMED-CT codes is intended to capture a patient who undergoes a PCI procedure.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a PCI procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED-CT codes that indicate PCI procedures.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes SNOMED-CT codes that do not indicate PCI procedures or that indicate an emergent PCI procedure.)
